form.description: Qualified Small Business Payroll Tax Credit for Increasing Research Activities

fields.name: employer_identification_number
fields.label: Employer identification number (EIN)

fields.name: name
fields.label: Name (not your trade name)

fields.name: reporting_form
fields.label: The credit will be reported on (check only one box)

fields.name: reporting_quarter
fields.label: Report for this quarter (check only one box)

fields.name: income_tax_period_ending_date
fields.label: Ending date of income tax period

fields.name: income_tax_return_included_form6765
fields.label: Income tax return filed that included Form 6765

fields.name: date_income_tax_return_was_filed
fields.label: Date income tax return was filed

fields.name: ein_used_on_form6765
fields.label: EIN used on Form 6765

fields.name: amount_from_form6765_line36
fields.label: Amount from Form 6765, line 36 or amount allocated to your EIN

fields.name: amount_of_credit_taken_previous_periods
fields.label: Amount of credit from column (e) taken on previous period(s)

fields.name: remaining_credit
fields.label: Remaining credit (subtract column (f) from column (e))

fields.name: total_add_lines_1g_to_5g
fields.label: Add lines 1(g) through 5(g) and enter the total here

fields.name: amount_from_part1_line6g
fields.label: Enter the amount from Part 1, line 6(g)

fields.name: amount_from_form941_line5a_column2_or_form943_line3_or_form944_line4a_column2
fields.label: Enter the amount from Form 941, line 5a, column 2; Form 943, line 3; or Form 944, line 4a, column 2

fields.name: amount_from_form941_line5b_column2_or_form944_line4b_column2
fields.label: Enter the amount from Form 941, line 5b, column 2; or Form 944, line 4b, column 2

fields.name: add_lines_8_and_9
fields.label: Add lines 8 and 9

fields.name: multiply_line10_by_50_percent
fields.label: Multiply line 10 by 50% (0.50). Check this box if applicable

fields.name: credit_against_employer_social_security_tax
fields.label: Credit against the employer share of social security tax (smaller of line 7 or 11)

fields.name: subtract_line_12_from_line_7
fields.label: Subtract line 12 from line 7

fields.name: amount_from_form941_line5c_column2_or_form943_line5_or_form944_line4c_column2
fields.label: Enter the amount from Form 941, line 5c, column 2; Form 943, line 5; or Form 944, line 4c, column 2

fields.name: multiply_line_14_by_50_percent
fields.label: Multiply line 14 by 50% (0.50). If applicable

fields.name: credit_against_employer_medicare_tax
fields.label: Credit against the employer share of Medicare tax (smaller of line 13 or 15)

fields.name: total_credit
fields.label: Total credit (add lines 12 and 16)
